item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Arthur Golden
item.description: "He was like a song I'd heard once in fragments but had been singing in my mind ever since." -- Arthur Golden

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Edgar Calabia Samar
item.description: "Salita. Nakasalalay lang ang lahat ng nararamdaman sa narinig na salita, sa mga narinig na salita, sa kapangyarihan ng salita na lumikha ng iba't iba pang ilusyon. Minsan, salita rin, isang salita lamang, ang may kakayahang magwasak ng lahat ng mga binuo, binuno, subalit ng mga salita rin nga lamang." -- Edgar Calabia Samar

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "We must always take sides. Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim. Silence encourages the tormentor, never the tormented." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Friends come in and out of our lives, like busboys in a restaurant." -- Stephen King

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Robert James Waller
item.description: "Complex things are easy to do. Simplicity's the real challenge." -- Robert James Waller

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what. - Atticus Finch" -- Harper Lee

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "You rarely win, but sometimes you do." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It was only a smile, nothing more. It didn't make everything all right. It didn't make ANYTHING all right. Only a smile. A tiny thing. A leaf in the woods, shaking in the wake of a startled bird's flight. But I'll take it. With open arms. Because when spring comes, it melts the snow one flake at a time, and maybe I just witnessed the first flake melting. - Amir" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: "Pleasure to me is wonder—the unexplored, the unexpected, the thing that is hidden and the changeless thing that lurks behind superficial mutability." -- H.P. Lovecraft

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "And that's the thing about people who mean everything they say. They think everyone else does too." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "They say I'm old-fashioned, and live in the past, but sometimes I think progress progresses too fast!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by Andy Rooney
item.description: "It's paradoxical that the idea of living a long life appeals to everyone, but the idea of getting old doesn't appeal to anyone." -- Andy Rooney

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Roslyn add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I’m on a roller coaster that only goes up, my friend." -- John Green
